title: Human Hair Ponytail Extensions Wrap Around Ponytail Medium Brown for Women 14 Inch Long Straight Magic Paste Binding Pony Tail Clip in Hairpiece with Comb #4
features: 【Fresh Ponytail Look in Minutes】 Hairro warp/tie up ponytail saves you from the waiting of hair growth, You could have longer and more voluminous beautiful hair at any time. We promise 100% human hair with competitive price, no synthetic or animal hair mixed.

【Multiple Styles for Your Chirstmas Dress Up】 Easy to wear, good for high, low and side ponytail look. The hair comes in natural straight, but can be restyled by curing and coloring. The hair can stand for 180 degree celsius, please apply heat protectant before curling.
【Different Length Available】 14-22 inch, 80-95g. Fuller hair than like products on the market, if you have very fine hair, these maybe heavy for you.

【Machine Net】 Large inner net keeps the hair neat and prevents shedding, keeping your ponytail in well protect. There is a small comb inside to make sure the extensions stay in place for all day wear. No need to worry it will fall even when you are sporting.
【Sincere Customer Support】If you are not sure which color suits you, welcome to email us a photo for color match.
description: A cute ponytail can make you look younger and more energetic. Unlike synthetic hair, human hair ponytail allows you to design your own hair and let it blend better.
1.We recommend deep conditioning once a week or once a fortnight since there Is no natural nutrition to the extensions like our own hair.
2.Please apply some essence oil to the end of the extensions, which can avoid  frizzing.
3.Let the hair dry naturally, do not expose it under the sun or use hair dryer, and comb your hair with wide tooth comb or your fingers.

Considering light and different displayers, the exact color might be slightly different from it showed in the picture. We try our best to describe the item specifically, if you have any problem while shopping, please feel free to let us know.
